Paytable.paybackBody: For this game, the long-term, theoretically-expected payback {RTP}.
Paytable.overallChances: There is a 1 in {odds} overall chance of winning a prize on each play.

Error.genericErrorText: There has been an internal error. EXIT and relaunch the game.

landscape.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers to win the associated prize.
landscape.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Gold Bars Symbol to win a prize instantly.
landscape.text3: {instantWin2X} A 2x over Gold Bars doubles the prize.

portrait.text1: Match Your Numbers to Lucky Numbers to win the associated prize.
portrait.text2: {instantWin} Reveal a Gold Bars Symbol to win a prize instantly.
portrait.text3: {instantWin2X} A 2x over Gold Bars doubles the prize.

landscape.text1: {wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus Symbol to trigger the Wheel Bonus.
landscape.text2:
WHEEL BONUS – Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game.
The inner wheel reveals your prize and the outer wheel reveals the prize multiplier.

portrait.text1:
{wheel} Reveal a Wheel Bonus Symbol to trigger
the Wheel Bonus.
portrait.text2:
WHEEL BONUS – Spin the wheel to begin the bonus game.
The inner wheel reveals your prize and
the outer wheel reveals the prize multiplier.

landscape.text1: {collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus Symbol to trigger the Prize Bonus.
landscape.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Select the Gold Cases to reveal prizes.
Prizes accumulate in the Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal an empty case with COLLECT Symbol and collect your prize!

portrait.text1:
{collect} Reveal a Prize Bonus Symbol to trigger
the Prize Bonus.
portrait.text2:
PRIZE BONUS - Select the Gold Cases to reveal prizes. Prizes accumulate in the
Total Bonus Win meter.
Reveal an empty case with COLLECT
Symbol and collect your prize!

Game.collectBonusInfo:
REVEAL AN EMPTY CASE
TO END THE BONUS &
COLLECT YOUR PRIZE!
